definition: legendary/fantasy saga/romance/short stories of the Tang and Song Dynasty
to pass on/to spread/to transmit/to infect/to transfer/to circulate/to conduct (electricity)
The Chronicles of Narnia, children's stories by C.S. Lewis
urban legend (translation of recent Western term)/story or theory circulated as true/same as 都會傳奇|都会传奇
urban legend (translation of recent Western term)/story or theory circulated as true/same as 都市傳奇|都市传奇

sentences.english: The lacquered screen that tells the history of a clan of scholars?
sentences.chinese: 能告訴人們一派雅士傳奇的漆質屏風？

sentences.english: Then I have patted "the Day Yunshan Legend" with him.
sentences.chinese: 緊接着，我又跟他拍了《天雲山傳奇》。

sentences.english: Welcome to a world where you shape the epic sagas that will be told to future generations.
sentences.chinese: 歡迎來到這個留芳千古的史詩傳奇般故事的世界。

sentences.english: Its light and resistant gear was taken as a novelty.
sentences.chinese: 它的輕便耐磨的齒輪被看做是一個傳奇。

sentences.english: They are gorgeously captivating and comparable to that of legendary cruisers, and customized choppers.
sentences.chinese: 他們華麗的迷人和相若的傳奇巡洋艦和定製的摩托車。

sentences.english: This skill earned him the nicknames "Air Jordan" and "His Airness.
sentences.chinese: 這個技術爲他博得了飛人喬丹和空中傳奇的綽號。

sentences.english: About music, is clearly one of the characteristics of the Chuanqi art.
sentences.chinese: 講究音律，顯然是傳奇藝術的特徵之一。

sentences.english: Legend No. 9, for piano, 4 hands in D major.
sentences.chinese: 大調爲鋼琴四手聯彈而作的第9傳奇曲。

sentences.english: The stories of the Knights of the Round Table make up the Arthurian cycle.
sentences.chinese: 亞瑟王傳奇是由一些圓桌武士的故事構成。

sentences.english: He is a legend in his own lifetime for his scientific discoveries.
sentences.chinese: 他在科學上的發現使他一生都成爲傳奇式人物。

sentences.english: A legendary old man collected a precious imperial carriage of the Tang dynasty.
sentences.chinese: 一位傳奇老人收藏有唐代的珍品鑾輿。

sentences.english: This will be announced to the world tomorrow, putting an end to the whole saga .
sentences.chinese: 明天整個世界將明朗，這段傳奇故事劃上句號。

sentences.english: It is a legend would be a landslide tsunami wave tail.
sentences.chinese: 傳奇它一晃動尾巴就會山崩海嘯。

sentences.english: In short, it is the lifeblood of every Summoner in the League of Legends.
sentences.chinese: 總之，這是命脈中的每一個召喚聯盟的傳奇。

sentences.english: Another homage to music legends - this time the Beatles.
sentences.chinese: 這幅壁畫是獻給甲殼蟲樂隊的傳奇音樂人的。

sentences.english: All the legends have been great - they've all been brilliant with me.
sentences.chinese: 每個傳奇球星都是偉大的，他們讓我蓬蓽生輝。

definition: (of a story etc) to unfold/to play out/to develop (a technique etc)/to enact/(logic) to deduce/to infer
to stand out from the masses (idiom)
to interpret/to comment and explain/to annotate/to perform (i.e. interpret a theatrical role)/to decode/interpretation/annotation
huge/great/grand/worthy of the greatest admiration/important (contribution etc)
to talk about/to narrate/to give an account
unique and unmatched (idiom); unrivalled/nothing compares with it
